snippet.title: Skyforge - Community Game Guide
snippet.description:
We are very pleased to present this amazing Skyforge Game Guide created by Wizardkir, a member of the Skyforge community!  It features a detailed walk through for players new to the game!
Play Skyforge for free:  http://go.sf.my.com/SkyforgeYT

Topics covered in this video are: basic movement, combat, character stats & progression, transportation, quests & adventures and many more!  This is truly a fantastic video made for the community, by the community.

DISCLAIMER
This unofficial video has been created by Wizardkir, an Alpha Test participant and simply a nice person.  The video represents actual gameplay shot from an early version of the game and does not reflect its final quality.

Play Skyforge for free:  http://go.sf.my.com/SkyforgeYT

Our Social Links
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialSkyforge/
Twitter:https://twitter.com/GodsofSkyforge
Instagram: COMING SOON
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/officialskyforge
Play Skyforge for free: 
http://go.sf.my.com/SkyforgeYT

What is Skyforge?
Allods Team & My.com are proud to present Skyforge -- a highly-stylized free-to-play AAA Sci-Fi Fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game featuring exciting dynamic combat inspired by console action games, set in a brand new universe of gods and heroes, who use futuristic technologies to fight off incredible creatures and protect their planet against space invasions. The strongest of the heroes will take their path from a young immortal to the Great God, ascending to the climax of glory and head the Pantheon. 

Relevant Similar Games: MMORPG
Allods
World of Warcraft / WoW
WildStar
The Elder Scrolls Online / EOS
ArcheAge
Tera
Neverwinter
Star Wars: The Old Republic / SWTOR
Eden Eternal
Guild Wars 2
Rift
Aion
